TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServerProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.ServerProtocol

Docs.summary: The .NET Framework creates an instance of the class to process XML Web service requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can override the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerProtocol.RouteRequest%2A> method to process XML Web service requests that are not explicitly declared and handled by users through a method in their XML Web service marked with `WebMethodAttribute`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can override the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerProtocol.RouteRequest%2A> method to process XML Web service requests that are not explicitly declared and handled by users through a method in their XML Web service marked with `WebMethodAttribute`.
